Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the establishment of an escrow account in any court which holds a special proceeding to recover real property
Summary: Requires any court which holds a special proceeding to recover real property to establish an escrow account where the tenant shall submit any owed rent into such account.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd §§701, 769, 791 & 796-a, RPAP L; amd §204, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the New York city civil court act, in relation to the establishment of an escrow account
